oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Full Gospel Jesus Church service home movie, 1973
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of several services of the same congregation. A service with a large congregation with an unknown guest speaker. Service depicts man filled with the spirit running around service, children playing music, serpent handling. Man preaches with serpent bite on hand and drinks strychnine. Man does lay preaching on police officer. A woman spins with a serpent box and becomes slain in the spirt.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Lay preaching; Slain in the Spirit; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region
Brown, Berry; Elledge, Larry; Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Jesus Name tradition services home movies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Mary Vance Jesus Name Tradition photographs and home movies
